contest-event.event-date: April 30, 1960 D Durham League Contest (Section A) Durham League Contest (Section A) 10 Test Piece Contest Durham League Contest durham-league-contest-section-a The 2010 contest, due to take place on 5th December, was cancelled due to heavy snow. (4barsrest news article) Sinfonia Alla Tragedia Clarence Ballroom, Spennymoor, County Durham Prizes - 1st £18 and trophy, 2nd £10 and cup, 3rd £5. 11 bands competed.
